content.description: The x axis ranges from negative 6 to 6 in increments of 1. The y axis ranges from negative 4 to 5 in increments of 1. All coordinates are approximate. Moving from left to right:
content.question: The curve enters the window at (negative 4 comma negative 4.5). The curve increases to cross the x axis at (negative 3 comma 0) and continues to reach a high point at (negative 1 comma 4.2). The curve decreases to cross the y axis at (0 comma 4) and reach a low point at (4 comma 0). The curve then increases to exit the window at (6.5 comma 5). ​The graph of the polynomial function <math alttext="y equals P open parentheses x close parentheses"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>P</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></math> is shown. Which of the following could define <math alttext="P open parentheses x close parentheses"><mi>P</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="P open parentheses x close parentheses equals fraction numerator open parentheses x minus 4 close parentheses open parentheses x plus 3 close parentheses squared over denominator 12 end fraction"><mi>P</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mn>12</mn></mfrac></math>

​<math alttext="P open parentheses x close parentheses equals fraction numerator open parentheses x minus 4 close parentheses squared open parentheses x plus 3 close parentheses over denominator 12 end fraction"><mi>P</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mn>12</mn></mfrac></math>

​<math alttext="P open parentheses x close parentheses equals fraction numerator open parentheses x plus 4 close parentheses open parentheses x minus 3 close parentheses squared over denominator 12 end fraction"><mi>P</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mn>12</mn></mfrac></math>

​<math alttext="P open parentheses x close parentheses equals fraction numerator open parentheses x plus 4 close parentheses squared open parentheses x minus 3 close parentheses over denominator 12 end fraction"><mi>P</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mn>12</mn></mfrac></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="P open parentheses x close parentheses equals fraction numerator open parentheses x minus 4 close parentheses squared open parentheses x plus 3 close parentheses over denominator 12 end fraction"><mi>P</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mn>12</mn></mfrac></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Construct equivalent graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations of functions that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context, with and without technology.
